column10: 3rd{{efn|Lost in the play-off semi-final to [[Enfield Town F.C.|Enfield Town]] 3–2.}}

3rd{{efn|Promoted into the [[Isthmian League|Isthmian Premier]] via the play-offs, beating [[Harlow Town F.C.|Harlow Town]] 4–2 in the semi-final and [[Brentwood Town F.C.|Brentwood Town]] 3–2 in the 2011 Isthmian Division One North play-off Final.}}
5th{{efn|Lost in the play-off semi-final to [[Bognor Regis Town F.C.|Bognor Regis Town]] 2–1.}}
